description:
This is a market on the higher placed finisher at the 2022 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix, Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc. The race takes place over 63 laps of the 4.909-kilometre Autodromo Enzo e Dino Ferrari in Italy, commonly known as Imola and former home of the San Marino GP, on Sunday, April 24.

The market will resolve to “Max Verstappen” if Max Verstappen finishes ahead of Charles Leclerc, and “Charles Leclerc” if Charles Leclerc finishes ahead of Max Verstappen. 

Note:
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Charles Leclerc does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Max Verstappen”. 
- If Charles Leclerc finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Charles Leclerc”. 
- If neither Charles Leclerc nor Max Verstappen finish the race before May 1 (11 PM ET), then the market will resolve to 50-50. 
- If for any reason the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before May 1, 2022, the same market conditions will apply.

markets.question: Formula 1: Who will finish ahead at the 2022 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix: Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc?
